settings.title: Settings
settings.unsavedWarnings: Unsaved changes. They will be lost if you leave.
settings.saveFolderTooltip: The folder, the files of measurement will be saved to
settings.identifierTooltip: The name of all files, that store the measurements, will begin with this identifier
settings.withoutVideoTooltip: The video to be analyzed needs to be opened externally
settings.withVideoTooltip: The video to be analyzed will be opened within H77+
settings.videoTooltip: The video that will be analyzed
settings.startTooltip: Time of start of measurement on video
settings.endTooltip: Time of end of measurement on video
settings.videoDoesNotExist: The video file does not exist
settings.saveFolderDoesNotExist: The given save folder does not exist.
settings.fileNotExists: The file does not exist, or you do not have the permission to access it.
settings.corruptedVideo: Corrupted video file, or unsupported format
settings.saveFileNotWritable: The settings file is not writable

keyboard.title: Keys
keyboard.unsavedChanges: Unsaved changes. They will be lost if you leave.
keyboard.keyTooltip: The key that belongs to this occurence
keyboard.name: Name
keyboard.nameTooltip: The name that belongs to this occurence
keyboard.typeTooltip: Type of occurence; Interval (I) or Event (E)
keyboard.corruptedKey: Corrupted key: key must be letter or number
keyboard.fileNotExists: The file does not exist, or you do not have the permission to access it.
keyboard.saveFileNotWritable: The settings file is not writable

import.title: Import
import.filesTooltip: The xlsx or ods file containing the measurement data
import.worksheetTooltip: The worksheet, that contains the occurence list
import.firstRowTooltip: The row number of the first row, that contains data (excluding header)
import.numberTooltip: The letter of column that contains the number
import.keyTooltip: The letter of column that contains the key
import.name: Name
import.nameTooltip: The letter of column that contains the name
import.typeTooltip: The letter of column that contains the type
import.orderTooltip: The letter of column that contains the order
import.timeTooltip: The letter of column that contains the time
import.identifierTooltip: The letter of column that contains the identifier
import.lengthOfMeasurementTooltip: The address of cell that contains the length of measurement
import.keysheetTooltip: The name of worksheet that contains the occurences
import.lengthsDoNotMatch: The length data of imported files do not match
import.keysDoNotMatch: The key data of imported files do not match

saveSuccess.title: Successful save
saveSuccess.saveFolderTooltip: The folder where the result will be stored

override.confirmationBody: The file with the given name already exists. Do you want to override it?

leaveConfirm.title: Confirmation
leaveConfirm.wantToLeave: Are you sure you want to leave?

analysis.missingSettingsOrKeys: Either the settings or the key file is not loaded
analysis.jumpTooltip: Set time to given point in time (all occurence that happend after this will be removed)
analysis.name: Name
analysis.videoDoesNotExist: The video file does not exist, or you do not have the permission to access it.
analysis.corruptedVideo: Corrupted file, or unsupported cideo format.
analysis.unfinishedEdit: Editing must be finished, before continuing the measurement
analysis.overJump: Can not jump over the end of measurement ({{length}} s)
analysis.measurementInProgress: Measurement in progress, can not save
analysis.editInProgress: Edit in progress, can not save
analysis.stopBeforeEdit: Time must be stopped before editing data
analysis.longerThenLength: Time must be positive, and smaller than the length of measurement ({{length}} s)
analysis.title: Analysis

split.title: Split measurement file
split.lengthTooltip: The length of pieces, the file will be splitted to
split.piecesTooltip: The number of pieces, the file will be splitted to
split.piecesRangeError: Pieces needs to be a positive number
split.lengthRangeError: Length needs to be between 0 and the length of measurement ({{len}} s)

clip.title: Clip from measurement file
clip.rangeBeginError: Begin must be a positive number and smaller than the length of measurement ({{len}} s) and the end ({{end}} s)
clip.rangeEndError: End must be a positive number, smaller than the length of measurement ({{len}} s) and greater than the begin ({{begin}} s)

edit.title: Edit measurement data
edit.identifierEditTooltip: The identifier whose data will be edited
edit.identifierTooltip: The identifier that belongs to the occurence
edit.keyTooltip: The key that belongs to the occurence
edit.name: Name
edit.nameTooltip: The name (type) that belongs to the occurence
edit.orderTooltip: The order that belongs to the occurence
edit.timeTooltip: The time that belongs to the occurence
edit.unknownKey: The given key does not exist
edit.timeRangeError: Time needs to be positive and smaller than the length of measurement ({{len}} s)
edit.unknownIdentifier: The given identifier does not exist

afterworks.fileTooltip: The xlsx or ods file containing the measurement data
afterworks.saveTypeTooltip: Type of file to be saved
afterworks.editInProgress: Edit in progress, you can not leave before dropping or saving
afterworks.title: Postproduction
